FuncDef: This command specifies that ICMPv6 host and network unreachable messages are generated by this interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of destination unreachable ICMPv6 messages are issued in the time frame specified by the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 2000.
Specifies the time frame, in seconds, that is used to limit the number of destination unreachable ICMPv6 messages to be issued. Values-1 to 60.
